pr_title: [ML][Inference] add tags url param to GET

timeline.message: [ML][Inference] add tags url param to GET

timeline.bodyText:
Why do we need to verify that it has all the tags?
Isn't the bool query with tag filters enough?
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: no, as that is an or and the decision was to make it an and
replies.author: benwtrent

timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: Ah, I do think your query building is better. Will see about refactoring :)
replies.author: benwtrent

timeline.bodyText: Could you add a unit test to TrainedModelProviderTests for the new functionality?
timeline.author: przemekwitek
timeline.diffHunk:
